sentences.en: The UN secretary-general seconded the appeal for peace.
sentences.cn: 联合国秘书长支持这项和平呼吁。

sentences.en: The Secretary-General was asked to mediate in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 有人请秘书长来调解这次纷争。

sentences.en: The Security Council can nominate anyone for secretary-general.
sentences.cn: 安全理事会可以提名任何人为秘书长。
